price: هغوى (کوډګرانو) وويل: ای موسىٰ يا به يې ته غورځوې، يا به موږ ړومبي غورځونكي شو؟
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنۡ أَلۡقَىٰ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna awwala man alqā
